mapper.insert: insert into food_tickettype (ticketName, requirement, cheap, ticketNum, liveTime, lastModifyBy, lastModifyTime, needScore) values (#{ticketName},#{requirement},#{cheap},#{ticketNum},#{liveTime},#{lastModifyBy},NOW(),#{needScore});
mapper.update: update food_tickettype set ticketTypeStatus=1, lastModifyBy=#{username}, lastModifyTime=NOW() where ticketTypeId=#{ticketTypeId}
update food_tickettype set ticketTypeStatus=2, lastModifyBy=#{username}, lastModifyTime=NOW() where ticketTypeId=#{ticketTypeId}
update food_tickettype set receive=receive+1 where ticketTypeId=#{ticketTypeId}
